metadata.title: Ambassador Rahim Hayat meets EU special envoy

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 15 (APP): Ambassador of Pakistan to Belgium and Luxembourg Rahim Hayat Qureshi on Tuesday met with EU Special Envoy for Non-proliferation and Disarmament Stephan Klement in Brussels as a follow-up to his visit to Pakistan. During the meeting, they discussed matters of mutual interest including avenues to deepening engagement and Pakistan-EU cooperation.
